subject: Re: Support Suspended | 60 Days Past Due - Reminder: Invoice INV166216 from
message:
Hi Joshua, 

Invoice has been GR'd and sent to AP for processing.  This should be included in this week's pay run.  


Kind Regards,

Noreen Areola

Purchase Operations Support Team Leader

 

Holcim Australia Pty Ltd

Suite 201 L2 7-9 Irvine Place BELLA VISTA NSW 2153 Australia

Phone: 0419 475 972

Mobile: +61 419 475 972

Email: noreen.areola@holcim.com

www.holcim.com.au

 

This email is confidential and intended only for the use of the above named addressee.

If you have received this email in error, please delete it immediately and notify us by email or telephone.



On Tue, 16 Sept 2025 at 20:12, Joshua Smith <joshua.smith@holcim.com> wrote:
Hi Noreen,

Are you able to confirm when payment will be processed?

Regards,

 

Joshua Smith

Senior Communications Manager

 

Holcim Australia Pty Ltd

Lvl 40, 100 Miller Street, North Sydney, NSW 2060, Australia

Mobile: +61 439 109 452

Email: joshua.smith@holcim.com

www.holcim.com.au


Connect with me on LinkedIn

 

This email is confidential and intended only for the use of the above named addressee.

If you have received this email in error, please delete it immediately and notify us by email or telephone.


On Tue, 16 Sept 2025, 6:56 pm Qureshi, Anis, <anis.qureshi@litera.com> wrote:

Hi Joshua,

Thanks for the response.

We can only reinstate the service once the invoice is closed via Payment. So, we request you to please process payment asap.

Regards.

Anis.

From: joshua.smith@holcim.com
Sent: 9/14/2025 3:57 pm GMT-05:00
To: Billing - lms.ar@litera.com (lms.ar@litera.com)
Cc: joshua.smith@lafargeholcim.com
Subject: Re: Support Suspended | 60 Days Past Due - Reminder: Invoice INV166216 from

Hello Liera
 
Apologies for the delay in updating you. The invoice was submitted to our accounts payable team last week. I have asked them to fast track payment.
 
It's critical the service is not suspended to allow our the continuity of business communication. Please reinstate the service and I'll revert shortly with an update on payment status.
 

Regards,

Joshua Smith

Senior Communications Manager

Holcim Australia Pty Ltd

Lvl 40, 100 Miller Street, North Sydney, NSW 2060, Australia

Mobile: +61 439 109 452

Email: joshua.smith@holcim.com

www.holcim.com.au

Connect with me on LinkedIn

This email is confidential and intended only for the use of the above named addressee.

If you have received this email in error, please delete it immediately and notify us by email or telephone.

On Mon, 15 Sept 2025, 12:14 am Billing, <lms.ar@litera.com> wrote:
Dear Holcim Australia & New Zealand,

Our records show that the attached invoice is now 60 days past due. Previous attempts to contact your company regarding the status of this invoice have not procured a successful response from you.

Please be advised that your service support is now suspended until such time that the outstanding balance has been settled in full (including any interest chargeable in accordance with our terms).

All responses should be addressed to us.

To avoid this course of action, we ask that you immediately remit payment.

Invoice Information:

Invoice No: INV166216
Invoice Date: 6/16/2025
Invoice Due Date: 7/16/2025
Amount Due: $21,235.02

Please remit payment according to the invoice terms using one of the options below:

ACH or Wire Transfer:
See instructions on invoice.

Check:
Payable to: Litera Microsystems
USPS Mailing Address:
FREEDOM SOLUTIONS GROUP LLC
PO BOX 779261

Overnight Courier Address:
PNC BANK C/O FREEDOM SOLUTIONS GROUP LLC
Lockbox 779261
350 EAST DEVON AVE
ITASCA IL 60143

Contact lms.ar@litera.com to update billing and email information.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

lms.ar@litera.com
